title: How to write a thousand word essay? How does it like? What are some examples - Quora

response.answer_text: Guidelines for 1000 word essay structure. Introduction Introduces problem statement, your contention and aim of essay in maximum 100 or 200 words.Brief history and background Body of Essay(approx. 800 words) Paragraph 1 (approx. 200-300 words). • Identifies evidence supporting/disagreeing with your contention (topicsentence) • Brief discussion • Your conclusion about this piece of evidence and links to next paragraph Paragraph 2 (approx. 200-300 words). • Identifies evidence supporting/disagreeing with your contention (topicsentence) • Brief discussion • Your conclusion about this piece of evidence and links to next paragraph Paragraph 3 (approx. 200-300 words). • Identifies evidence supporting/disagreeing with your contention (topicsentence) • Brief discussion • Your conclusion about this piece of evidence and links to conclusion Conclusion(approx. 100-200 words) • Summarizes your evidence and justifies your conclusion. There is an another option to complete this 1000 words essay is with the help of online paper writing service. They will assist you to do the work.
